song_lyrics: Juvo chhabī Shyām sundarvar kerī re,
Shir par pāgh pechāḷī navrangī re,
Kāne guchchh gulābī mathe kalangī re... 3
Gajrā torā gaḷe gulābnā hār re,
Āvī upar bhramar kare chhe gunjār re... 4
Nang jaḍyā kunḍaḷ motīnā vrund re... 5
Shītaḷ thayo Bhumānand kahe bhāḷī re... 6
title: Juvo chhabī Shyām sundarvar kerī re

metadata.kirtan_info:
1-755: Sadguru Bhoomanand Swami

Category: Leelana Pad
